segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 35
2. Yamakavagga
19. Paṭhamābhinandasutta
“Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
segments.en: “Mendicants, if you take pleasure in the eye, you take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
segments.en: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.

segments.pli: Yo sotaṃ … pe …
segments.en: If you take pleasure in the ear …

segments.pli: yo ghānaṃ … pe …
yo jivhaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
Yo kāyaṃ … pe …
yo manaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
segments.en: mind, you take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
segments.en: If you take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re not exempt from suffering.

segments.pli: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhuṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in the eye, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.

segments.pli: Yo sotaṃ … pe …
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in the ear …

segments.pli: yo ghānaṃ … pe …
yo jivhaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
Yo kāyaṃ … pe …
yo manaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
segments.en: mind, you don’t take pleasure in suffering.

segments.pli: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
segments.en: If you don’t take pleasure in suffering, I say you’re exempt from suffering.”

segments.pli: Sattamaṃ.
